title: Ballads of Bullant Ridge. No. 1
creator_credit: Academy Film Productions, Ronald Mason and Alan Marshall
brief_description: A series of bush ballad songs based on the “Speewa Jack” characters from the Alan Marshall stories illustrated by cartoonist Douglas Trainsh. The songs are ‘The Strongest man in town’; ‘The Boxing kangaroo’; and ‘Goanna oil’.
